channel.title: Vanity Numbers on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Vanity Numbers on 0x000216

item.title: Vanity, Thy Number is Toll Free
item.description: Vanity definitely has a place in business. Any technology that provides a competitive advantage, including a vanity toll-free number, is worth considering. What distinguishes a vanity number from a regular toll-free number is the connection between letters and numbers on a standard telephone keypad. While the “1” button lacks letters, numbers “2” through “9” each have three letters assigned to them. This letter-number association allows phone numbers to be dialed as words.

item.title: Flat Rate Toll Free Numbers
item.description: Are you searching for a reliable toll-free number for your business with predictable billing? Look no further than flat-rate toll-free service. Enjoy a consistent monthly bill and a comprehensive package of features without any additional charges. Additionally, there’s no risk involved as you can test the service with a complimentary 14-day trial. iTeleCenter offers an unlimited calling flat-rate service for just $49 per month. With this plan, you can say goodbye to per-minute charges, feature fees, activation fees, surcharges, hidden fees, confusing plans, and contracts.

item.title: Dirt Cheap Toll Free Numbers
item.description: Expanding your business opportunities is easier when potential clients can contact you without incurring call charges. Having a single toll-free number on your marketing materials allows customers to reach you whether you’re in or out of the office. While this service can be expensive, affordable options exist. You don’t need to pay exorbitant monthly fees for toll-free services. While some hosted PBX providers and forwarding services charge high rates, you can obtain a fully functional toll-free number for a minimal setup fee and a low monthly cost, plus call charges.
